duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform venipuncture, EKGs, and point of care testing, and assist with patient care and administrative duties.
Accompany patients to exam/procedure room, assist with walking and dressing, and collect/process specimens.
Assist physicians with procedures, take vital signs, and relay instructions to patients and families.
Fulfill clerical responsibilities such as sending/receiving patient medical records and obtaining lab/x-ray reports.
Enter orders into the electronic medical record system, manage medical supplies, and maintain examination rooms.
Maintain a safe, healthy work environment and ensure compliance with legal regulations.
Assist in the maintenance of medical charts and perform appointment scheduling and insurance verification.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/GED with completion of an approved Medical Assistant certificate course, and preferred Certified Medical Assistant. Heartsaver Certification from American Heart Association and/or BCLS also required.
